name: v0.10.12
body:
## What’s Changed

* Bump avro from 1.10.2 to 1.11.1 (#501) @dependabot
* Bump google-oauth-client to 1.34.1, google-http-client to 1.42.2 , google-api-client to 1.35.2 https://github.com/spotify/dbeam/commit/21d3698ee958e88c38c87fff6405ca3ed8125979
* Bump bouncycastle to 1.70 https://github.com/spotify/dbeam/commit/7e323f9e6ae2bdd032404fec6bc92ac20420d399
* Bump postgresql-socket-factory and mysql-socket-factory to 1.5.0 https://github.com/spotify/dbeam/commit/6005eb55c2c84f48d09ce83e81e92cf3ab9466c6
* Bump checkstyle from 10.3.1 to 10.3.3 (#516) @dependabot
* Bump maven-checkstyle-plugin from 3.1.2 to 3.2.0 (#518) @dependabot
* Beam SDK 2.41.0 and other upgrades (#517) @labianchin

name: v0.10.10

* Beam SDK 2.40.0 and other upgrades (#490) @labianchin

* Bump zstd-jni from 1.5.2-2 to 1.5.2-3 (#497) @dependabot
* Bump mysql-connector-java from 8.0.28 to 8.0.29 (#462) @dependabot

name: v0.10.9
body:
## What’s Changed

* Bump maven-surefire-plugin from 3.0.0-M5 to 3.0.0-M6 (#458) @dependabot
* Bump postgresql from 42.3.3 to 42.3.4 (#459) @dependabot

name: v0.10.8
body:
## What’s Changed

* Beam SDK 2.37 (#439) @labianchin
* Support MySQL UNSIGNED and some further docs (#438 #380) @labianchin @rulle-io 
* Bump postgresql from 42.3.2 to 42.3.3 (#432) @dependabot
* Bump maven-project-info-reports-plugin from 3.1.2 to 3.2.1 (#422) @dependabot
* Bump checker-qual from 3.20.0 to 3.21.2 (#426) @dependabot
* Bump error_prone_annotations from 2.10.0 to 2.11.0 (#425) @dependabot
* Bump zstd-jni from 1.5.0-4 to 1.5.2-1 (#424) @dependabot
* Bump mysql-connector-java from 8.0.27 to 8.0.28 (#423) @dependabot
* Bump slf4j.version from 1.7.32 to 1.7.35 (#421) @dependabot
* Beam SDK 2.36.0 and other upgrades (#420) @labianchin
* Bump postgresql from 42.3.1 to 42.3.2 (#416) @dependabot
* Bump h2 from 2.0.206 to 2.1.210 (#412) @dependabot
* Bump h2 from 2.0.202 to 2.0.206 (#407) @dependabot

name: v0.10.6
body:
## What’s Changed

* Beam SDK 2.35.0 and other upgrades (#398) @labianchin
* BIGINT always convert to long type and Bump h2 from 1.4.200 to 2.0.202 (#399) @dependabot

## What’s Changed

* Add --minRows parameter (#375) @labianchin

## What’s Changed

* Beam SDK 2.32.0 and other upgrades (#373) @labianchin
* Bump maven-enforcer-plugin from 3.0.0-M3 to 3.0.0 (#356) @dependabot
* Bump error_prone_annotations from 2.7.1 to 2.8.0 (#357) @dependabot
* Bump zstd-jni from 1.5.0-2 to 1.5.0-4 (#351) @dependabot
* Bump beam.version from 2.30.0 to 2.31.0 (#345) @dependabot
* Bump netty-handler from 4.1.65.Final to 4.1.66.Final (#348) @dependabot
* Bump auto-value.version from 1.8.1 to 1.8.2 (#347) @dependabot
* Bump mockito-core from 3.11.1 to 3.11.2 (#339) @dependabot
* Bump postgresql from 42.2.21 to 42.2.23 (#344) @dependabot
* Bump mysql-connector-java from 8.0.25 to 8.0.26 (#349) @dependabot
* Bump checkstyle from 8.43 to 8.45 (#353) @dependabot
* Fix table name returned for CASTed columns (#352) @rulle-io
* Beam SDK 2.30 and other updates (#335) @labianchin

## What’s Changed

* Beam SDK 2.29.0, several upgrades and build time improvements on usage of Github Actions
* Bump avro from 1.9.2 to 1.10.2 (#291) @dependabot-preview
* Bump threetenbp from 1.5.0 to 1.5.1 (#315) @dependabot
* Bump mysql-connector-java from 8.0.24 to 8.0.25 (#320) @dependabot
* Bump maven-gpg-plugin from 1.6 to 3.0.1 (#319) @dependabot
* Bump netty-handler from 4.1.59.Final to 4.1.63.Final (#316) @dependabot
* Bump auto-value.version from 1.8 to 1.8.1 (#311) @dependabot
* Bump mysql-connector-java from 8.0.23 to 8.0.24 (#314) @dependabot
* Bump junit from 4.13.1 to 4.13.2 (#312) @dependabot
* Bump maven-checkstyle-plugin from 3.1.1 to 3.1.2 (#308) @dependabot
* Bump maven-project-info-reports-plugin from 3.1.1 to 3.1.2 (#309) @dependabot
* Bump mockito-core from 3.8.0 to 3.9.0 (#313) @dependabot
* Bump jacoco-maven-plugin from 0.8.6 to 0.8.7 (#310) @dependabot
* Bump postgresql from 42.2.19 to 42.2.20 (#317) @dependabot
* Beam SDK 2.29.0 (#307) @labianchin
* Tweak psql e2e for Github actions (#300) @labianchin
* Bump maven-shade-plugin from 3.2.3 to 3.2.4 (#285) @dependabot-preview

- Beam SDK 2.28.0 and other upgrades (with Beam SDK official Java 11 support) #279 
- Fix row count overflow in logs and metrics - 96fc11602ca9b9d10b6e838c102031cf62d5d0de

- Beam SDK 2.25 https://github.com/spotify/dbeam/pull/259
- Documentation improvements b3021ff8806045ee1fe9cfcaf00ce01ac176ff3e
- Configurable `--avroSchemaName` f860342abdf48f84ac007a10972a7d5e9fddb0c9
- Support table name with dots or psql schema b0cbb6550bfadc17a45053541fb43b036275fc80
- Configurable `--dataOnly` flag to write only avro files and skip writing metrics and queries to output  https://github.com/spotify/dbeam/pull/242
- Upgrade dependencies and improve code
Beam SDK 2.13 - https://github.com/spotify/dbeam/pull/227

- Support for hourly partitioning #220 
- Beam SDK 2.22.0 #212 #213 
- Improve documentation #211
- Beam SDK 2.20.0, Avro 1.9.2 and other upgrades: https://github.com/spotify/dbeam/pull/195

- Code and API improvements https://github.com/spotify/dbeam/pull/183
- Handle null on terminal state 89128e7bee8440787aaedc951fa659e352512e74
- Remove tableName from queryBuilderArgs https://github.com/spotify/dbeam/pull/163
- Bump postgresql from 42.2.6 to 42.2.12 https://github.com/spotify/dbeam/pull/182
- Fix support for monthly partition: https://github.com/spotify/dbeam/pull/166

- Beam SDK 2.19.0 and other upgrades https://github.com/spotify/dbeam/pull/153
- `--table` parameter is no longer required when `--sqlFile` is used https://github.com/spotify/dbeam/pull/135

- Beam SDK 2.18 https://github.com/spotify/dbeam/pull/141 (https://beam.apache.org/blog/2020/01/13/beam-2.18.0.html)
- Fix monthly period support https://github.com/spotify/dbeam/pull/140

- Beam SDK 2.17 #132 
- Support for SQL pre commands #128 
- Fixes for user provided query #123 
- Configurable `--avroSchemaFilePath` #112
- Better error reporting on PsqlReplicationCheck #119

- Beam SDK 2.16 https://github.com/spotify/dbeam/pull/109
- Use Avro 1.9.1 library 0b60ee421f8c1b2be6892ea87b15c682ef563eb3
- Support for zstandard compression 0b60ee421f8c1b2be6892ea87b15c682ef563eb3
- Use a single JDBC connection when preparing the job 478b0f16bbf6cd4e3b6469430105063f3504d12a
- Use `java.time` instead of `joda` 43e826bba5e7563dd64ce686da8747b281b84f7b
- Use `nanoTime()` for time metrics 1cb72268ce58b7f5b7718578e457c42da7444901
- Remove Scala on tests 7126e213fa7c537ee856acec7866d43d588afee1

- Beam SDK 2.14 https://github.com/spotify/dbeam/commit/8b6a10e848dd3eab48fae5772b81ca2853697bdc
- Support for user provided `--sqlFile` query https://github.com/spotify/dbeam/pull/66
- Change default export timeout to P7D: https://github.com/spotify/dbeam/commit/d77745557cef2e0a2ae8ca576a426557c806a838

- Bump Beam SDK to 2.13.0 and other dependencies: bd3ab28bd5dc8b17dc6e0ca1d4058a056ccfa4bd 21ff3083682c8f04a7e1901a23862d15d4463493
- Bump KMS: 722f530358ef775e703e98fffb5e5fe9ae48f23f
- Improved throughput via encoding avro binary directly: ffc31da8916b9945346dc8205a6a1c0bd1f015c7 and https://github.com/spotify/dbeam/pull/69 (as first part of https://github.com/spotify/dbeam/pull/59)

Note that this release contains dependencies upgrades, please spend some more time validating your DBeam jobs before running in production; mainly for KMS and Google Cloud SQL usages.

name: BROKEN v0.9.0
body:
This version contains a but that is addressed at: https://github.com/spotify/dbeam/pull/69

- Bump Beam SDK to 2.13.0 and other dependencies: bd3ab28bd5dc8b17dc6e0ca1d4058a056ccfa4bd 21ff3083682c8f04a7e1901a23862d15d4463493
- Bump KMS: 722f530358ef775e703e98fffb5e5fe9ae48f23f
- Improved throughput via encoding avro binary directly: ffc31da8916b9945346dc8205a6a1c0bd1f015c7 (as first part of https://github.com/spotify/dbeam/pull/59)

Given this release contains dependencies upgrades, please spend some more time validating your DBeam jobs before running in production; mainly for KMS and Google Cloud SQL usages.

New features:
- Configurable `--exportTimeout` #56 (timeout and cancel job in case it runs for too long)

New features:

- Experimental support for parallel export/queries #54 #52 
- More logging for troubleshooting #55

name: v0.5.0
body:
- Beam SDK 2.5.0 : https://github.com/spotify/dbeam/pull/33
- Read password file from Beam FileSystems: https://github.com/spotify/dbeam/pull/37
